price: oborenih pogleda i poniženjem ophrvani. To će biti Dan kojim im je prijećeno!
arabic: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khāshiʿatan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun dhālika al-yawmu alladhī kānū yūʿadūna
